content.question: You will be asked to speak in Chinese on a specific topic. Imagine you are making an oral presentation to your Chinese class. First, you read and hear the topic for your presentation. Your presentation should be as complete as possible. Choose ONE Chinese-language movie that you have seen (such as Not One Less [Yi ge dou bu neng shao], Shower [Xizao], To Live [Huozhe], Eat Drink Man Woman [Yin shi nan nü], ... etc.). In your presentation describe this Chinese-language movie and explain its significance. You will have 4 minutes to prepare your presentation. Then you will have 2 minutes to record your presentation. Your presentation should be as complete as possible.
